content: south park watch caps two simple yet fun pom-pon watch-style caps inspired by the in- famous stan and cartman from the hit comedy south park make a matching set for your favorite double-trouble duo or just bring out the somewhat demented kid in you when you don your made- for-animated-tv hats pattern information hat worked in rounds half_double_crochet-increase = 2 half_double_crochet mc = main color blue for difficulty stan teal for cartman cc = contrast color red for stan yel- low for cartman fiber worsted 12 wpi quality yarn round 1 with mc chain 3 12 half_double_crochet in 3d chain from hook round 2 *1 approximately 175 yds/160m in mc half_double_crochet half_double_crochet-increase* repeat to end join to top of chain-2 18 half_double_crochet round 3 75 yds/68m in cc sample project chain 2 *2 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet-increase* repeat to end join to top of chain-2 24 was crocheted using plymouth half_double_crochet round 4 chain 2 *3 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet-increase* repeat to end join to top encore chunky 75% acrylic/25% of chain-2 30 half_double_crochet round 5 chain 2 *4 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet-increase* repeat to end wool join to top of chain-2 36 half_double_crochet round 6 chain 2 *5 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet-increase* re- notions peat to end join to top of chain-2 42 half_double_crochet round 7 chain 2 *6 half_double_crochet size j 6 00mm or to fit gauge half_double_crochet-increase* repeat to end join to top of chain-2 48 half_double_crochet round 8 chain darning needle 2 *7 half_double_crochet half_double_crochet-increase* repeat to end join to top of chain-2 54 half_double_crochet gauge round 9-18 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet to end join to top of chain-2 54 6 half_double_crochet and 6 row = 4 /5cm half_double_crochet join cc/break mc round 19-22 chain 2 half_double_crochet in each half_double_crochet to finished size end join to top of chain-2 54 half_double_crochet round 23 chain 1 single_crochet in each half_double_crochet to to fit an adult womanʼs head end join to chain-1 fo 54 single_crochet weave in ends circumference of 20-22 /50-55cm license pom-pon this work is licensed under the creative commons attribution-no create a 2-4 5-10cm pom-pon in cc using a pom-pon maker derivative works 3 0 united states or a piece of sturdy cardboard if using cardboard wrap yarn license to view a copy of this li- around the cardboard 60-100 times carefully remove the cense visit loops from the cardboard with a 1 /30cm length of cc tie a http //creativecommons org/licenses knot in the center of the loop bundle cut the ends of the /by-nd/3 0/us/ loops and fluff the finished pom-pon corrections patterns are test-crocheted and finishing checked for accuracy however if you find a discrepancy please email using the tail ends from the pom-pon attach the pom-pon to any corrections to the top of the hat weave in remaining ends kreations@kastroll com copyright © 2008 kastroll kreations all rights reserved
